body: This case may be incorrect, because C has to match A*B's dimensions. Let's set C's shape as (3,2) too.
body_html: This case may be incorrect, because C has to match A*B's dimensions. Let's set C's shape as (3,2) too.
body_text: This case may be incorrect, because C has to match A*B's dimensions. Let's set C's shape as (3,2) too.
